title: Problem with my client
body: Hello, I have a problem with the client that stays in authenticating and does not connect me at the end I see that there was an error while trying to connect to my account, uninstall it and reinstall it and nothing else use the client's tool to fix it and nothing any solution that can give me?

replies.body: Sounds like a network or server error. Check the server status page for known issues, and try rebooting your network devices and computer.

Thank you bro, system administrator of my Internet company and review first of all in the configurations, there, security, additional security that has not been actively activated and has told me that I am from Mexico but since I started playing always played in NA
